short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A method for retrieving LinkedIn job information and sending it to Jobalope.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This FREE extension lets Jobalope users save job opportunities they find on LinkedIn directly into their Jobalope Job Tracker with just one click.

The extension automatically extracts the essential details from the job post—such as the job title, company name, location, compensation, and posting date—and seamlessly populates a new row in your Jobalope Job Tracker. It’s a simple, efficient way to organize and manage your job applications, ensuring you never miss an opportunity to move forward in your job search.

Stay on top of your job search by streamlining the process with the Jobalope Job Tracker Extension!
The extension works great in Chrome and Edge browsers.
